metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14437 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
ImageMagick 7.0.8-4 has a memory leak in parse8BIM in coders/meta.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14437` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13').
